analysis.description: USDClassic.isContract (/unique_chucks/8/0xc93a59888e7e6f2849ba94acf767266299c4c415.sol) is declared view but contains assembly code

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/8/0xc93a59888e7e6f2849ba94acf767266299c4c415.sol:
	Contract USDClassic has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/8/0xc93a59888e7e6f2849ba94acf767266299c4c415.sol#139-142)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

USDClassic.claimToken (/unique_chucks/8/0xc93a59888e7e6f2849ba94acf767266299c4c415.sol#216-222) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_to,_value) (/unique_chucks/8/0xc93a59888e7e6f2849ba94acf767266299c4c415.sol#219-222)

USDClassic.isContract uses assembly (/unique_chucks/8/0xc93a59888e7e6f2849ba94acf767266299c4c415.sol)
